name: svg.draggy.js
description: A JavaScript library for dragging SVG things.

scripts.update-min: cp src/svg.draggy.min.js example/js/svg.draggy.js && git add example && git commit -m 'Updated svg.draggy.js in the example dir' .
scripts.deploy: cp -r example ../_tmp && git checkout gh-pages && cp -r ../_tmp/* . && git add . -A && git commit -m 'Rebuild.' && rm -rf ../_tmp ../_tmp.js

author: jillix <contact@jillix.com>
